title: HeavensPro
author: HeavensPro
content: The name of this topic is the question. What do you think? First of all about the whole technology. You can read more about it https://ton.org This project has been supported and launched by the Telegram team, by the way. For me, as for developers, it's theoretically and the new era of future cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I've already known this project and I think that they lack marketing and let everyone one that they're an existing project. They've blown it up before when they're on the news. But as they launch and operate, I think there's not such a loud noise about their project and that's why I think they need to be more aggressive with their marketing.
